subject: Track and Field
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: Oscar Pistorius will get another chance to run at the Olympics after South Africa won an appeal to advance to the men’s 4x400-meter relay final despite a collision in the first heat.
snippet: Oscar Pistorius will get another chance to run at the Olympics after South Africa won an appeal to advance to the men’s 4x400-meter relay final despite a collision in the first heat.
